input: I bought your so-called 'premium' headphones two weeks ago and the left ear cup already fell off. For $150, I expected something that would last more than 14 days. This is garbage quality and I want my money back NOW.

input: The customer service rep I spoke with yesterday was incredibly rude. I called to ask a simple question about my warranty and she interrupted me three times, talked down to me, and then hung up on me. Is this how you train your employees?

input: I returned a defective blender TWO MONTHS ago and I'm still waiting for my refund. Every time I call, someone tells me it's 'being processed.' How long does it take to process a simple refund?! I want my $89.99 back.

input: Your app crashed and deleted all my saved data. I had over a year's worth of workout logs and meal plans gone in an instant. I'm a paying customer and this is completely unacceptable. What are you going to do about it?

input: I ordered a size Medium shirt and received an XXL. This is the THIRD time you've sent me the wrong item. I'm starting to think your warehouse doesn't even look at orders before shipping them. Get it together.

input: I've been on hold for 45 MINUTES trying to reach someone about a billing discrepancy. input: I booked a hotel room through your platform and when I arrived, the hotel said they had no record of my reservation. I was stranded at midnight in a city I don't know with nowhere to sleep. Your platform is unreliable and dangerous.

input: Your 'waterproof' phone case was anything but waterproof. I followed all the instructions, sealed it properly, and my phone was destroyed at the beach. That's a $1,200 phone you just ruined with your misleading product.

input: I ordered a birthday cake from your bakery for my daughter's party. Not only was it delivered late, but the name was spelled wrong and the frosting was the wrong color. You ruined her birthday. She was in tears.
